name: IVAN POE (LIMITED TEST BETA)
description:
<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>

Dear beta-tester,

Thanks for agreeing to play this early level of our new video game: ‘Ivan Poe’

Dependent on the computer you use, please select either the Mac or PC file (and either a 32 or 64 bit version for Mac or Windows).

Download the appropriate file to your computer, and unzip the file (if required).

On a Mac: Dependent on your security preferences, double clicking the app to open could result in a “can’t be opened” message. You can override this by ‘right click’ / ‘control click’ →  ‘open’ - you will then be offered the option to open the app. Having opened it once it will then always open in the future .

On a PC: Run exe file within the main folder. Do not move or delete anything from the downloaded folder structure.

When you open the game it will load full screen, to start press ‘E’. To control Ivan Poe you can use the arrow keys and the space-bar to jump. You can also use the analog stick and buttons on a game controller to play the game.

If you have any problems downloading, opening or running the game do let us know at ivan@reactor.org.uk and we will try to resolve.

Let us know what you think to our test level on our twitter : https://twitter.com/rollinpoe

We look forward to your feedback on the game as it develops.

Cheers!

<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>

_ _ _ 

Ivan Poe is a Rolla-Cuboid-Furred-Dimenshun, Chaotic-Roleplay-Cum-Find-Your-Way-Adventure.
